name: ConfirmativeActionButton
body:
### Welcome to the jQuery confirmativeActionButton plugin GitHub Page. [Demo page](https://cdn.rawgit.com/Toocat/ConfirmativeActionButton/master/ConfirmativeActionButton/public_html/demo.html) ### Ease of Use `$("#someDiv").confirmativeActionButton();` ### Custom styling `$("#someDiv").confirmativeActionButton({`
        `cssNormalClass: "confirmativeActionButton",`
        `cssWaitingClass: "confirmativeActionButtonWaitingForConfirmation",`
        `cssActivatedClass: "confirmativeActionButtonConfirmed"`
`});` ### API & defaults `id: methods.guid.apply(this)`
`caption: "Confirmative Action Button"`
`confirmationCaption: "Click to confirm"`
`waitingTime: 3000`
`actionHandler: null`
`cssNormalClass: null`
`cssWaitingClass: null`
`cssActivatedClass: null`
### Self-destruction `$("#someDiv").confirmativeActionButton({id:"actionButton", actionHandler: function (e) {`
        `$("#actionButton").removeConfirmativeActionButton();`
`}});`
### Authors and Contributors @ecivic ### Support or Contact edo.civic@mail.com.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
